box2D.collision.IBroadPhase

type
interface
Interface for objects tracking overlap of many AABBs.

Instance Methods

createProxy(aabb : B2AABB, userData : Dynamic) : Dynamic

Create a proxy with an initial AABB. Pairs are not reported until UpdatePairs is called.

destroyProxy(proxy : Dynamic) : Void

Destroy a proxy. It is up to the client to remove any pairs.

getFatAABB(proxy : Dynamic) : B2AABB

Get the fat AABB for a proxy.

getProxyCount() : Int

Get the number of proxies.

getUserData(proxy : Dynamic) : Dynamic

Get user data from a proxy. Returns null if the proxy is invalid.

moveProxy(proxy : Dynamic, aabb : B2AABB, displacement : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2) : Void

Call MoveProxy as many times as you like, then when you are done call UpdatePairs to finalized the proxy pairs (for your time step).

query(callbackMethod : Dynamic -> Bool, aabb : B2AABB) : Void

parameters
callback This function should be a function matching signature function Callback(proxy:*):Bool
Query an AABB for overlapping proxies. The callback class is called with each proxy that overlaps the supplied AABB, and return a Boolean indicating if the broaphase should proceed to the next match.

rayCast(callbackMethod : B2RayCastInput -> Dynamic -> Float, input : B2RayCastInput) : Void

parameters
callback This function should be a function matching signature function Callback(subInput:B2RayCastInput, proxy:*):Float Where the returned number is the new value for maxFraction
Ray-cast agains the proxies in the tree. This relies on the callback to perform exact ray-cast in the case where the proxy contains a shape The callback also performs any collision filtering

rebalance(iterations : Int) : Void

Give the broadphase a chance for structural optimizations

testOverlap(proxyA : Dynamic, proxyB : Dynamic) : Bool

updatePairs(callbackMethod : Dynamic) : Void

Update the pairs. This results in pair callbacks. This can only add pairs.

validate() : Void

For debugging, throws in invariants have been broken
